TOOL_TIP.SCRIPT:
point = GetCursorPos() point:IncX(30) point:IncY(40) local iDelta = point:GetX() + UISelf:GetSize():GetX() - 1024 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() if iDelta > 0 then point:IncX(-iDelta) end
iDelta = point:GetY() + UISelf:GetSize():GetY() - 768 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetY() if iDelta > 0 then point:IncY(-iDelta) end UISelf:SetLocation(point)

point = GetCursorPos() point:IncX(30) point:IncY(40) local iDelta = point:GetX() + UISelf:GetSize():GetX() - 1024 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() if iDelta > 0 then point:IncX(-iDelta) end
iDelta = point:GetY() + UISelf:GetSize():GetY() - 768 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetY() if iDelta > 0 then point:IncY(-iDelta) end UISelf:SetLocation(point)

FORM.SCRIPT: local Parent = UISelf:GetParent() local PSize = Parent:GetSize() local MSize = UISelf:GetSize() UISelf:SetLocation(Point2(PSize:GetX() - MSize:GetX(), MSize:GetY())) UISelf:SetStaticText("")

TOOL_TIP.SCRIPT:
local BeforeLoc = GetCursorPos() local BeforeSize = UISelf:GetSize() BeforeLoc:IncX(30) BeforeLoc:IncY(30) local iDelta = BeforeLoc:GetX() + UISelf:GetSize():GetX() - 1024 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() if iDelta > 0 then BeforeLoc:IncX(-iDelta) end
iDelta = BeforeLoc:GetY() + UISelf:GetSize():GetY() - 768 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetY() if iDelta > 0 then BeforeLoc:IncY(-iDelta) end
local wEquip = GetUIWnd("ToolTip_Equip") local wExtend = GetUIWnd("ToolTip2_Extend") local wExtendEquip = GetUIWnd("ToolTip_Equip_Extend") local wItemExtend = GetUIWnd("ToolTipItemExtend")
local Loc = wItemExtend:GetLocation() local Size = wItemExtend:GetSize() local Size2 = wEquip:GetSize()
if false == wExtend:IsNil() then Size2:IncX(wExtend:GetSize():GetX()) end if false == wExtendEquip:IsNil() then Size2:IncX(wExtendEquip:GetSize():GetX()) end
iDelta = BeforeLoc:GetY() + Size:GetY() - 768 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetY()
Loc:SetX(BeforeLoc:GetX() + BeforeSize:GetX()) if iDelta > 0 then Loc:SetY(BeforeLoc:GetY() - iDelta) else Loc:SetY(BeforeLoc:GetY()) end
wItemExtend:SetLocation(Loc)
iDelta = BeforeLoc:GetX() + BeforeSize:GetX() + Size:GetX() + Size2:GetX() - 1012 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() if iDelta > 0 then BeforeLoc:IncX(-iDelta) end
UISelf:SetLocation(BeforeLoc)

FORM.SCRIPT: local Parent = UISelf:GetParent() local PSize = Parent:GetSize() local MSize = UISelf:GetSize() UISelf:SetLocation(Point2(PSize:GetX() - MSize:GetX(), MSize:GetY())) UISelf:SetStaticText("")

TOOL_TIP.SCRIPT:
local BeforeLoc = GetCursorPos() local BeforeSize = UISelf:GetSize() BeforeLoc:IncX(30) BeforeLoc:IncY(30) local iDelta = BeforeLoc:GetX() + UISelf:GetSize():GetX() - 1024 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() if iDelta > 0 then BeforeLoc:IncX(-iDelta) end
iDelta = BeforeLoc:GetY() + UISelf:GetSize():GetY() - 768 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetY() if iDelta > 0 then BeforeLoc:IncY(-iDelta) end
local wEquip = GetUIWnd("ToolTip_Equip") if wEquip:IsNil() == false then local Loc = wEquip:GetLocation() local Size = wEquip:GetSize()
iDelta = BeforeLoc:GetX() + BeforeSize:GetX() + Size:GetX() - 1012 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() if iDelta > 0 then BeforeLoc:IncX(-iDelta) end
iDelta = BeforeLoc:GetY() + Size:GetY() - 768 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetY()
Loc:SetX(BeforeLoc:GetX() + BeforeSize:GetX()) if iDelta > 0 then Loc:SetY(BeforeLoc:GetY() - iDelta) else Loc:SetY(BeforeLoc:GetY()) end wEquip:SetLocation(Loc) end UISelf:SetLocation(BeforeLoc)

FORM.SCRIPT: local Parent = UISelf:GetParent() local PSize = Parent:GetSize() local MSize = UISelf:GetSize() UISelf:SetLocation(Point2(PSize:GetX() - MSize:GetX(), MSize:GetY())) UISelf:SetStaticText("") g_fAutoExitTooltipFixPos = GetAccumTime()

TOOL_TIP.SCRIPT: if g_fAutoExitTooltipFixPos ~= nil then if GetAccumTime() - g_fAutoExitTooltipFixPos > 10 then UISelf:Close() end end

FORM.SCRIPT: local Parent = UISelf:GetParent() local PSize = Parent:GetSize() local MSize = UISelf:GetSize() UISelf:SetLocation(Point2(PSize:GetX() - MSize:GetX(), MSize:GetY())) UISelf:SetStaticText("")

BUTTON.SCRIPT: UISelf:CloseParent() local SubWnd = GetUIWnd("ToolTip_CloseBtn_Extend") if false == SubWnd:IsNil() then SubWnd:Close() end

TOOL_TIP.SCRIPT:
point = GetCursorPos() point:IncX(30) point:IncY(40) local iDelta = point:GetX() + UISelf:GetSize():GetX() + 12 - 1024 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() if iDelta > 0 then point:IncX(-iDelta) end
iDelta = point:GetY() + UISelf:GetSize():GetY() + 12 - 768 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetY() if iDelta > 0 then point:IncY(-iDelta) end
local wEquip = GetUIWnd("ToolTip_Equip") if wEquip:IsNil() == false then local pos = wEquip:GetLocation() ODS("Position : " .. pos:GetX() + wEquip:GetSize():GetX() .. "\n") if pos:GetX() + wEquip:GetSize():GetX() >= 1012 + UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() then ODS("Before : " .. point:GetX() .. "\n") point:SetX(1024 + UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() - wEquip:GetSize():GetX() - UISelf:GetSize():GetX() - 36) ODS("Revise : " .. UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() + 1024-wEquip:GetSize():GetX() - UISelf:GetSize():GetX() - 36 .. "\n") end end
point:SetX(20); point:SetY(20);
UISelf:SetLocation(point)

point = GetCursorPos() point:IncX(450) point:IncY(40) local iDelta = point:GetX() + UISelf:GetSize():GetX() + 12 - 1024 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() if iDelta > 0 then point:IncX(-iDelta) end
iDelta = point:GetY() + UISelf:GetSize():GetY() + 12 - 768 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetY() if iDelta > 0 then point:IncY(-iDelta) end
local wEquip = GetUIWnd("ToolTip_Equip") if wEquip:IsNil() == false then local pos = wEquip:GetLocation() ODS("Position : " .. pos:GetX() + wEquip:GetSize():GetX() .. "\n") if pos:GetX() + wEquip:GetSize():GetX() >= 1012 + UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() then ODS("Before : " .. point:GetX() .. "\n") point:SetX(1024 + UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() - wEquip:GetSize():GetX() - UISelf:GetSize():GetX() - 36) ODS("Revise : " .. UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() + 1024 - wEquip:GetSize():GetX() - UISelf:GetSize():GetX() - 36 .. "\n") end end
point:SetX(460); point:SetY(20);
UISelf:SetLocation(point)

FORM.SCRIPT: local Parent = UISelf:GetParent() local PSize = Parent:GetSize() local MSize = UISelf:GetSize() UISelf:SetLocation(Point2(PSize:GetX() - MSize:GetX(), MSize:GetY())) UISelf:SetStaticText("")

TOOL_TIP.SCRIPT:
local tooltip2 = GetUIWnd("ToolTip2") local tooltip2_ex = GetUIWnd("ToolTip2_Extend")
if tooltip2:IsNil() == true then return end
local point = tooltip2:GetLocation() local size = tooltip2:GetSize()
if tooltip2_ex:IsNil() == true then point:IncX(size:GetX()) else point:IncX(size:GetX() * 2) end
iDelta = point:GetY() + UISelf:GetSize():GetY() + 12 - 768 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetY() if iDelta > 0 then point:IncY(-iDelta) end
UISelf:SetLocation(point)

FORM.SCRIPT: local Parent = UISelf:GetParent() local PSize = Parent:GetSize() local MSize = UISelf:GetSize() UISelf:SetLocation(Point2(PSize:GetX() - MSize:GetX(), MSize:GetY()))
local Parent = UISelf:GetParent() local PSize = Parent:GetSize() local MSize = UISelf:GetSize() UISelf:SetLocation(Point2(PSize:GetX() - MSize:GetX(), MSize:GetY()))

TOOL_TIP.SCRIPT:
point = GetCursorPos() point:IncX(30) point:IncY(40) local iDelta = point:GetX() + UISelf:GetSize():GetX() + 12 - 1024 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() if iDelta > 0 then point:IncX(-iDelta) end
iDelta = point:GetY() + UISelf:GetSize():GetY() + 12 - 768 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetY() if iDelta > 0 then point:IncY(-iDelta) end
local wEquip = GetUIWnd("ToolTip_Equip") if wEquip:IsNil() == false then local pos = wEquip:GetLocation() ODS("Position : " .. pos:GetX() + wEquip:GetSize():GetX() .. "
") if pos:GetX() + wEquip:GetSize():GetX() >= 1012 + UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() then ODS("Before : " .. point:GetX() .. "
") point:SetX(1024 + UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() -wEquip:GetSize():GetX() - UISelf:GetSize():GetX() - 36) ODS("Revise : " .. 1024 + UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() -wEquip:GetSize():GetX() - UISelf:GetSize():GetX() - 36 .. "
") end end UISelf:SetLocation(point)

point = GetCursorPos() point:IncY(-50) local iDelta = point:GetX() + UISelf:GetSize():GetX() - 1024 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() if iDelta > 0 then point:IncX(-iDelta) end iDelta = point:GetY() + UISelf:GetSize():GetY() - 768 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetY() if iDelta > 0 then point:IncY(-iDelta) end UISelf:SetLocation(point)

local tooltip2 = GetUIWnd("ToolTip2") if tooltip2:IsNil() == true then return end
local point = GetCursorPos() local size2 = tooltip2:GetSize() point:IncX(size2:GetX() + 53) point:IncY(40) local iDelta = point:GetX() + UISelf:GetSize():GetX() + 12 - 1024 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() if iDelta > 0 then point:IncX(-iDelta) end
iDelta = point:GetY() + UISelf:GetSize():GetY() + 12 - 768 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetY() if iDelta > 0 then point:IncY(-iDelta) end
UISelf:SetLocation(point)

local CallWnd = GetUIWnd("ToolTip2") if CallWnd:IsNil() == true then return end
local point = CallWnd:GetLocation() local size2 = CallWnd:GetSize() point:IncX(size2:GetX()) local iDelta = point:GetX() + UISelf:GetSize():GetX() + 12 - 1024 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() if iDelta > 0 then point:IncX(-iDelta) end
UISelf:SetLocation(point)

local CallWnd = GetUIWnd("ToolTip2") local SubWnd = GetUIWnd("ToolTip2_Extend") local ParentWnd = GetUIWnd("ToolTip_Equip")
if CallWnd:IsNil() == true then return end if ParentWnd:IsNil() == true then return end
local point = CallWnd:GetLocation() local size = CallWnd:GetSize()
if true == SubWnd:IsNil() then point:IncX(size:GetX() * 2) else point:IncX(size:GetX() * 3) end
point:SetY(ParentWnd:GetLocation():GetY())
UISelf:SetLocation(point)

local ParentWnd = GetUIWnd("ToolTip_CloseBtn")
if ParentWnd:IsNil() == true then return end
local point = ParentWnd:GetLocation() local size = ParentWnd:GetSize()
point:IncX(size:GetX())
UISelf:SetLocation(point)

local BeforeLoc = GetCursorPos() local BeforeSize = UISelf:GetSize() BeforeLoc:IncX(30) BeforeLoc:IncY(30) local iDelta = BeforeLoc:GetX() + UISelf:GetSize():GetX() - 1024 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetX() if iDelta > 0 then BeforeLoc:IncX(-iDelta) end
iDelta = BeforeLoc:GetY() + UISelf:GetSize():GetY() - 768 - UISelf:GetResolutionGap():GetY() if iDelta > 0 then BeforeLoc:IncY(-iDelta) end
UISelf:SetLocation(BeforeLoc)
